page.title: 02LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: { } No shops are found in these villages but milk, groceries, bread etc. are all delivered by vans or the population commute to Carmarthen town. People not employed in farming either travel to the towns of Carmarthen or Llanelli to work in shops, offices, banks etc.. Some work at the stone quarry near Meinciau or the local colliery at Cynheidre. No factories are found here. No primary or secondary schools are found in this area, children go by bus to Pontyates Llangyndeirne or Carmarthen town. Main form of heating in the area is coal. There is little entertainment found in the area, the nearest cinema is at Llanelli town, dancing at Llanelli and Carmarthen towns, bingo at Pontyates.
